newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: India's IOC tenders to buy February kerosene.
newsitem.headline: India's IOC tenders to buy February kerosene.

text.p: State-owned Indian Oil Corp (IOC) has issued a tender to buy superior kerosene for arrival in February, traders said on Thursday.
The tender seeks three 30,000-tonne cargoes for delivery to Bombay on the Indian west coast, and 40,000-45,000-tonne cargoes for delivery to Madras or Haldia on the east coast.
The tender closes on January 9 and offers are valid to January 10.

In its last tender, IOC bought one 45,000-tonne cargoes for delivery in January at a premium of around $2.30 per barrel to MidEast spot quotes on a cost-and-freight basis east coast and a second cargo at 75 cents premium to MidEast quotes on a free-on-board Kuwait basis.
